content.text: Hi there! I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for fun?
I like to paint outdoors, make bagels, and arm wrestle.
That's cool! I like to watch Netflix with my family and make 3D models for video games and animations.
Oh wow, that sounds really interesting! What kind of video games do you like to make 3D models for?
Mostly action and adventure games. I love the feeling of being immersed in a world where I can be the hero.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a gamer myself, but I can see how that would be really cool.
Yeah, it's definitely a lot of fun! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite band is Iron Maiden.
Oh wow, me too! They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
That's awesome! I love their music. They're so talented.
I know, right? They're one of the best bands ever.
What do you like to do with your family?
We like to watch movies, play games, and go out to eat. We also like to travel together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family too.
Yeah, it's the best.
So, what are you looking for in a friend?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent. I also want someone who is willing to try new things and is open to new experiences.
That sounds like a great list of qualities. I think I'm pretty similar to that.
I think so too.
So, what do you think? Do you want to be friends?
I'd love to be friends!
Awesome! I'm so glad.
